name: Permits
text:
A permit shall be required for the purchase and use of:
     (1)  Any consumer fireworks commonly known as firecrackers upon payment of a fee of $25; and
     (2)  Any aerial devices, display fireworks, or articles pyrotechnic for the purposes of section 132D-16 upon payment of a fee of $110. [L 1994, c 180, pt of §1; am L 2000, c 233, §10; am L 2006, c 183, §12]
